isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Cylinder Head and Valve Train - Clean, Inspect, Measure, and Test - Clean Cylinder Head

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, leave valves installed in cylinder head to protect valve seats during cleaning.

step1.para: Remove deposits and gasket material from the cylinder head gasket surface using a rotary wire brush or sanding block with mineral spirits.
Clean all cylinder head mounting bolt holes using an appropriately sized brush.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, clean or repair dirty or damaged bolt threads which may cause binding and false torque readings.

step1.para: Clean threads of all cylinder head mounting bolts.
Wash rocker arm assemblies, roller tappets, and push rods in a suitable solvent and dry thoroughly. Replace any bolts that have damaged threads.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not use chlorinated solvents on bolts or crankcase tapped holes. Parts should be clean, dry, and free of any chemicals other than engine oil.
